/command.Description: The command to execute: 'save' = Read device settings and save to file; 'load' = Load settings from file an write to device; 'read' = Read device settings only (no save).

/device.Description: Comma separated list of devices that should be used for loading/saving device settings, e.g. 'dev99,dev100'.

/errortext.Description: The error text used in error messages.

/filename.Description: Name of settings file to use.

/path.Description: Directory where settings files should be located. If not set, the default settings location of the LabOne software is used.

/throwonerror.Description: Throw an exception is there was error executing the command.
